body:
Something seem to have changed in Mac OS High Sierra that breaks the build process of bison.
Apparently something related to a change in command line tools.

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1339056/spack-build.out.txt)

I have sent an email to bug-bison@gnu.org in order to investigate the issue.
I'm not very experienced so, in the mean time, anyone would care to look into this issue as well?
title: Bison fails to compile on Mac OS High Sierra
